name: micronics-wizmax-ts
description: - Home page - Endorsing the products (3D, Animations, etc) - Product page - Endorsing all the products - Contact page - Users are able to contact or email the contact person of Micronics for any inquiries - Distributor page - Users are able to inquire for a partnership with the Micronics. - Shop page - Users are able to view all shops of Micronics nationwide - Internalization - Users are able to change the texts language of the application
